query.result:
| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | noi | Latin | nos | | ripetere | Latin | repetere | | Pigmalione | Greek | Πυγμαλίων (Pygmalíōn) | | allora | Latin | ad+illam+horam |
**Notes:**
* The etymology of "noi" is uncertain, but it is thought to be derived from the Latin word "nos", which means "we". * The etymology of "ripetere" is from the Latin verb "repetere", which means "to repeat". * The etymology of "Pigmalione" is from the Greek name Πυγμαλίων (Pygmalíōn), which is the name of a legendary sculptor who fell in love with his own creation, a statue named Galatea. * The etymology of "allora" is from the Latin phrase "ad illam horam", which means "at that hour".
